Re-downloaded game after it came to Steam, and realized once more how the game has gone down the drain. Not mention Blizzard broke their promise about putting a single player/co-op campaign in the game. But don't worry, the Battle Pass and microtransactions work without issue.

Consecutive match 6 times, every game has a player shortage, 5v5 matched is impossible, its always 3v5 or 5v4, less or more player situation, the experience is vvvvvvvery poor!! During the switching to different servers, whether Asian, European, American, are  same. Its sooooooooooooo suck !!!!

El juego tÃ©cnicamente es muy bueno, creo que todos estamos de acuerdo con eso. Pero siendo realista y sincero, es el mismo juego anterior solo que con algunas cositas diferentes, nada fuera de lo comÃºn. Solo se enfocan en chupar la plata a los jugadores y el contenido es escaso y realmente pÃ©simo. Saquen contenido mas rÃ¡pido en vez de enfocarse en hacer dinero.

I LOVED Overwatch when it originally came out, and played LITERALLY EVERY THURSDAY FOR 6 YEARS with my bros. Overwatch 2 came along and we had to kick one person out of our group cause they removed 6v6 for 5v5. Removed personal ranks, but now added hero ranks and didn't even put the stats from all the years i've already grinded on the game. Honestly seeing my Reinhardt on "Level 1" or "Rank 1" or whatever doesn't make me feel better it makes me mad that I "lost" all of the stats that you're not wanting me to re-grind back up.

I've lost all hope in this game and my Thursdays along with the other 5 people that used to play. We are trying to find new games to play now that could fit our whole group, but we're having a hard time finding something. That's why this is so frustrating because Overwatch was a great game, but not anymore.
If you see that I've played this game just ignore it

ã€‚

cat

Once upon a time, I had a cat, I had ten dollars, I would buy it food for eight dollars, bathe it often, and it was very sticky to me.

Later, I took it out to play, passers-by thought it was cute, they fed it cat food, ham sausage, I was very unhappy because it was mine. I wanted to carry it home, but he broke away from me and meowed at the person who gave it good food, I hugged him a few times and he didn't go with me, and scratched me, so I turned around and left.....

Later, I came across it by chance on the road, and it was dirty. Passers-by will only give it good food and play with it, but they will not take it home and bathe it. It saw me and followed me home, I shut it out, it meowed outside the door, it was very uncomfortable,
but I wouldn't want it anymore
.
